m_szDocTitle: Porsche May Build Battery-Electric, Hydrogen Fuel Cell Vehicle | Digital Trends
m_szDocSumamry: Delivered to your inbox for free! Last year, reports circled  that Porsche  was planning an all-electric version of the upcoming Pajun sedan. It appears that those claims weren’t just a pipe dream, as a Volkswagen Group executive has again teased the concept of a silent Porsche. But don’t worry, purists. Your 911s and Caymans are safe. Dr. Ulrich Hackenberg, the Research and Development Chief for Audi, recently displayed the following graphic at VW Group’s annual conference. The image comes courtesy of Autocar . Autocar As you can see, there are spots reserved for a BEV (Battery Electric Vehic
